@PeterRizun
 and 
@PeterMcCormack
LN wallets send each other perfectly valid bitcoin TXs, without miners or any other 3rd party involved. Truly P2P. So besides storing private keys, LN wallets also store Bitcoin TXs, which can't be double spent thanks to time lock contracts, which are enforced by the blockchain.
